cards.title1: Tech Culture is the partner of the international forum Digital Bridge!
cards.text1: On Sep 28-29 Digital Bridge gathers experts and companies from digital technologies, business and IT spheres in Nur-Sultan.
cards.title2: Web 3.0, метавселенная и NFT: что общего?
cards.text2: Артур Сундетов, технический директор Tech Culture, объясняет происхождение Web 3.0 и относительное сходство поколений разработки Интернета.
cards.title3: Tech Culture подписала меморандум с Международным университетом информационных технологий (МУИТ)

tokenomics.title: Tokenomics development
subtitle: Tokenomics is an
economic model
of a token
tokenomics.description: “The goal of any tokenomics is to change the behavior of users in a project under a certain system constraint. This is achieved by optimal consensus, where each side gets what it needs.”
tokenomics.technologies: Technologies used in the development of the tokenomics model:

development.title: Developing an economic model of the token
stages: Audit of the current tokenomics of the project.
Final report as a presentation with Plotly dashboards, graphics and conclusions.

title: CeFi
